<<<<<<< HEAD
Britains sorrowful lamentation, for the loss of their gracious Queen Mary who departed this life, the 28th. of December, 1694. To the tune of, The bleeding heart.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed at London, and re-printed at Edinburgh by John Reid, [Edinburgh] : 1695.
Printed in two columns. Verse - "What dismal News is this I hear,". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed at London, and re-printed at Edinburgh by John Reid, [Edinburgh] : 1695.
Printed in two columns. Verse - "What dismal News is this I hear,". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
John Reid
Edinburgh
London
